AT.name: VoxelMaker
AT.description: VoxelMaker ist sozusagen deine 3D-Leinwand und 3D-Kamera. Lass dich inspirieren und werde kreativ! Create 3D models of your own design! Voxel models are made from 3D cubes and create a stylised "blocky" look – like 3D pixel art. VoxelMaker’s fully-featured model editor makes use of both buttons and touch controls, allowing you to cut, copy and paste part of your model to move, rotate or duplicate sections with ease. You can also insert text, create, edit and save your own color schemes, and more. Finally, use your Nintendo 3DS™ to display 3D images of your scenes in the upper screen and then save them to your Screenshot Album, or share them on Miiverse™. - Create 3D models using a full-featured model editor - Use buttons and the touch screen to edit your model and set up your scene - View your art in 3D in the upper screen while editing in the lower screen - Export your model to SD card in .vmk (VoxelMaker) or .vox (MagicaVoxel) format - Save scenes to your Screenshot Album, or share them on Miiverse™

AU.name: VoxelMaker

VoxelMaker’s fully-featured model editor makes use of both buttons and touch controls, allowing you to cut, copy and paste part of your model to move, rotate or duplicate sections with ease. You can also insert text, create, edit and save your own color schemes, and more. Finally, use your Nintendo 3DS™ to display 3D images of your scenes in the upper screen and then save them to your Screenshot Album, or share them on Miiverse™. With VoxelMaker, you have both a 3D canvas and camera in your hands: be inspired and create! - Create 3D models using a full-featured model editor - Use buttons and the touch screen to edit your model and set up your scene - View your art in 3D in the upper screen while editing in the lower screen - Export your model to SD card in .vmk (VoxelMaker) or .vox (MagicaVoxel) format - Save scenes to your Screenshot Album, or share them on Miiverse™

BE.name: VoxelMaker
BE.description: Créez des modèles en 3D de vos propres dessins! Les modèles Voxel sont réalisés à l'aide de cubes en 3D et offrent une apparence "carrée" stylisée, un pixel art en 3D. L'éditeur très complet de VoxelMaker fait appel aux deux boutons et aux commandes tactiles afin de couper, copier et coller une partie de votre modèle pour déplacer, faire pivoter ou dupliquer des parties facilement. Vous pouvez également insérer du texte, créer, modifier et enregistrer vos propres schémas de couleurs, et plus encore. Finalement, utilisez votre Nintendo 3DS™ pour afficher des images 3D de vos scènes dans le Écran supérieur et ensuite sauvegardez-les dans votre Album de captures ou partagez-les sur Miiverse™. Avec VoxelMaker, vous disposez d'une toile et d'une caméra en 3D. Laissez libre cours à votre inspiration! - Créez des modèles en 3D à l'aide d'un éditeur de modèles très complet - Utilisez les boutons et l'écran tactile pour modifier votre modèle et réaliser votre scène - Affichez votre art en 3D dans l'écran supérieur pendant l'édition dans l'écran inférieur - Exportez votre modèle sur une carte SD au format .vmk (VoxelMaker) ou .vox (MagicaVoxel) - Sauvegardez vos scènes dans votre Album de captures ou partagez-les sur Miiverse™

PT.name: VoxelMaker
PT.description: Com VoxelMaker você tem tanto tela 3D e câmera em suas mãos: inspire-se e criar! Create 3D models of your own design! Voxel models are made from 3D cubes and create a stylised "blocky" look – like 3D pixel art. VoxelMaker’s fully-featured model editor makes use of both buttons and touch controls, allowing you to cut, copy and paste part of your model to move, rotate or duplicate sections with ease. You can also insert text, create, edit and save your own color schemes, and more. Finally, use your Nintendo 3DS™ to display 3D images of your scenes in the upper screen and then save them to your Screenshot Album, or share them on Miiverse™. - Create 3D models using a full-featured model editor - Use buttons and the touch screen to edit your model and set up your scene - View your art in 3D in the upper screen while editing in the lower screen - Export your model to SD card in .vmk (VoxelMaker) or .vox (MagicaVoxel) format - Save scenes to your Screenshot Album, or share them on Miiverse™
